item.title: Herbalife introduces a new skincare line to the Asia Pacific region
item.description:
Herbalife, a nutrition company, has expanded its product line with the launch of Herbalife SKIN, a new skincare collection available in Asia Pacific markets. This line complements Herbalife’s “outer nutrition” range, which focuses on achieving healthy, youthful skin through a blend of natural ingredients, botanicals, extracts, and scientific formulation. [Image of Herbalife logo] Herbalife SKIN products are designed to create softer, smoother, and more radiant skin while minimizing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/herbalife-introduces-a-new-skincare-line-to-the-asia-pacific-region/

item.title: Vitamin D does not increase longevity
item.description:
While some believe vitamin D is a miracle cure, new research from the University of Cambridge, which analyzed data from almost 100 studies, indicates that vitamin D supplementation alone doesn’t decrease mortality rates in older adults. Past research connected low vitamin D levels with illnesses like multiple sclerosis, cancer, and cardiovascular disease. To clarify if vitamin D supplementation by itself (without calcium or other interventions) impacts death from various causes, researchers examined 73 observational cohort studies and 22 randomized trials on naturally occurring vitamin D and supplements (D2 or D3)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/vitamin-d-does-not-increase-longevity/
